description: This is the main source file for a Flutter application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes theme setup, main app widget, game page with game logic, UI components, and interaction handling.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up a MaterialApp with theming for Tic Tac Toe.

classes.name: TicTacToePage
classes.description: Main game page displaying the game board, status, and controls.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Configures and returns the app theme using Material 3 and custom colors.

methods.name: _statusText
methods.description: Generates the status message based on the game state.
